title: How long will it take to send my original marksheet for the June exam (1st year BCom) held by Madras University Distance Education? - Quora
tags: University of Madras, Institute of Distance Education

response.answer_text: Roughly 3 months from the date of the results declared. If you dont receive even after 3 months, reach the IDE office with your ID card, collect the mark sheet in person. They send the mark sheets folded. It makes the mark sheets very week to be torn across the folding.
